Articles.Content: I have installed S^3 (1/10 RSS), but it doesn't do anything. I'm just curious, do I need another mod(s) to make it work? I have both Kopernicus already and TextureReplacer installed, but it doesn't matter. Why it no work?
Yes, you need to install Real Solar System, I would use CKAN to do this, makes it a breeze to install. Select install, refresh mods list, check boxes, and install!

Yes, you need to install Real Solar System, I would use CKAN to do this, makes it a breeze to install. Select install, refresh mods list, check boxes, and install!

But I want 1/10 RSS. Earth, but Kerbin sized. Unless S^3 takes the installed RSS mod and shrinks everything .-. Idk.

I suggest posting on the release thread for the mod, Niemand303 will be more likely to see it there. And no, legoclone09, you don't install RealSolarSystem...

ZooNamedGames: you did install a texture pack, though, right?

I suggest posting on the release thread for the mod, Niemand303 will be more likely to see it there. And no, legoclone09, you don't install RealSolarSystem...

ZooNamedGames: you did install a texture pack, though, right?

I DLed the S^3 mod from KerbalStuff and put it into my Gamedata like every mod. It does not contain a texture pack.

- - - Updated - - -

Also link to that thread .-. can't find it.
S^3 is a ModuleManager config, which when installed alongside Real Solar System, it makes it 1/10 scale.
Huh! Right you are. Weird, I thought it was a standalone cfg. That...does not make sense, I'll talk to niemand303....
